name: Kakuto Chojin: Back Alley Brutal
description:
Kakuto Chojin: Back Alley Brutal is an arcade-fighting game developed by Dream Publishing. It came out on 11-11-2002. It was published by Microsoft Game Studios. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Kakuto Chojin: Back Alley Brutal on Xbox.
Yoshikatsu Kanemaru produced the game. It was directed by Kunihiko Nakata. It was scored by Hiroshi Utsuyama.
